title: 28 Kase Chess Backgammon Table
content: Fans of decorative and ornate furniture pieces will adore this chess table, with its turned pedestal base and octagonal tabletop design.
The table has a built-in drawer for spare games pieces, and the elegant, black finish brings a dash of class and refinement to any living room.
The manufactured wood construction is robust and heat-resistant.

title: 36 Mcnally Chess Backgammon Table
content: This classy and multifunctional chess table is ideal for game enthusiasts and family game nights. The removable top function with four cup holders means
this model can double up as a dining table when you have guests. This unitâ€™s striking tapered legs ensure that it serves as a show-stopping centerpiece to
any living space, while the maple and poplar wood construction is sturdy and long-lasting.

title: Acme Furniture 28 Bishop Chess Table Reviews Wayfair
content: The 28" Chess & Backgammon Table is fully equipped for head-to-head chess, checkers, and backgammon competition. These chairs set traditionally styled, are
crafted from manufactured wood and solid hardwood. The recessed chess and checkers playfield is accessed by removing the top and backgammon play surface.
The fortress includes all accessories needed to play all 3 games. The two extremely comfortable, soft padded game chairs add the finishing touches to this multi-functional table set.
Add this classic combination game table to your living room, study, or den today.

title: Lamodahome Chess Bckgammon Set
content: For homes with a farmhouse-style interior, this chess table, with its distressed wooden construction, makes the perfect statement piece for your sitting room or den. The set comes with six chess pieces,
and an integrated shelf which you can use to store various board games and coffee table books. This unit has a mark and scratch-resistant finish, making it a breeze to wipe down and clean.

title: Trademark Global Chess Games Deluxe Chess Backgammon
content: The Trademark Games Chess & Games Deluxe Chess and Backgammon Table is a great addition to any home or gaming area. It includes the chess pieces that make it perfect for your home gaming zone.
This backgammon and chess table features a veneered construction that enhances its strength. It has storage under it that is ideal for storing chess pieces when they are not being used.

This chess and backgammon table provides the versatility of the gaming table as well as the functionality of a beautiful end table. It has a dark cherry finish that blends well with most of the decors.
This Chess & Games Deluxe Chess and Backgammon Table from Trademark Games is a nice addition to any home.
